name: Dungeon's Resolve
description:
The first public version of a game I'm making, kind of based on the mobile game "Archero" but designed for PC.

Comments and bug reports welcomed. Currently ONLY plays in 1920x1080 resolution non-resizable windowed mode. May contain bugs and does contain many placeholder/unfinished content.

WASD to move. Attacking is automatic and only happens when you are not moving. Press 1, 2, or 3 to switch between the 3 weapons available so far (Only in the development version).
